bitbuster

The bitbuster module gives you depack support for data packed using the bitbuster algorithm.

FUNCTION NAMES

The functions <depack> and <depack_block> are MODULE local, which means you have to add the prefix "bitbuster." to its name. This is to prevent possible name clashes with functions from other libraries you might be using.  However, if you define <MAKE_BITBUSTER_GLOBAL> then these functions will be available without the "bitbuster." prefix as well.
